newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee strengthens against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee strengthens against dollar.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee was fixed stronger against the dollar on Thursday but weaker against the pound, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was quoted at a mean commercial rate of 20.0510 to the dollar from 20.1535 on Wednesday. Against the pound, the rupee weakened to a mean of 32.598 from 32.548 on Wednesday.
Dealers said the rupee's fixing on Thursday was in line with trends in overnight international markets.
